HomePage.title: AICON MAC MODELS - Precision in Miniature
HomePage.description: Crafting intricate architectural models with unparalleled detail and artistic excellence.

curatedExperience.title: Curated Experience
curatedExperience.description: Thoughtful design process from concept to completion

HomePage.aboutText1: Established in 2013 as Dubai's premier architectural model atelier, AICONMAC combines traditional craftsmanship with museum-quality presentation standards. Each piece in our collection represents a meticulous fusion of art, architecture, and precision engineering.
HomePage.aboutText2: Our gallery of 40+ master artisans has curated over 1200 architectural masterpieces, establishing a legacy that transcends borders and transforms the way architectural visions are presented and preserved.
HomePage.featuredDetails: Precision Architectural Model — Mixed Media, Scale 1:200
HomePage.specializationsDesc: From grand urban landscapes to intricate building details, we curate the models for architectural excellence.

master.title: Masterplan
master.description: Comprehensive urban visions that capture the grand scale of development projects with museum-quality presentation.

architectural.title: High & Midrise
architectural.description: Detailed building models showcasing both exterior beauty and interior sophistication in exhibition-ready formats.

industrial.title: Industrial Models
industrial.description: Complex facility models that communicate technical excellence and operational flow with artistic precision.

HomePage.voicesDesc: Trusted by leading architects, developers, and designers across the UAE and beyond.
HomePage.featuredMasterpiecesDesc: A curated selection of our most distinguished architectural models, each representing the pinnacle of craftsmanship and artistic excellence.

testimonial.quote: Building the future, one miniature at a time. Their models are breathtaking.
testimonial.name: Architectural Firm
testimonial.title: Global Partner

callToAction.transformVision: Transform your architectural vision into a museum-quality masterpiece. Our master artisans are ready to bring your dreams to life with unparalleled precision and artistry.

ProjectsPage.commissionDescription: Ready to see your architectural vision transformed into a museum-quality miniature?

CareersPage.heroDescription: Become part of a distinguished team where architectural vision meets artisan craftsmanship. Shape the future of miniature architecture with precision, passion, and purpose.
CareersPage.whyJoinDescription: Where traditional craftsmanship meets contemporary innovation in the pursuit of architectural miniature excellence.
CareersPage.joinTeamDescription: Submit your application to become part of our master craftsmen collective
CareersPage.ctaDescription: Join a team where your artistic vision shapes architectural miniatures that will be treasured for generations. Your precision, our platform.
CareersPage.formMessagePlaceholder: Tell us about your passion for precision craftsmanship, your experience with architectural models, and why you want to join our atelier...

creativeMastery.title: Creative Mastery
creativeMastery.desc: Work on prestigious architectural projects with cutting-edge tools and materials

precisionExcellence.title: Precision Excellence

recognitionGrowth.title: Recognition & Growth

artisanCulture.title: Artisan Culture
artisanCulture.desc: A workplace that values craftsmanship, attention to detail, and artistic vision

precision.title: Precision as Philosophy
precision.desc: Every millimeter matters. We believe that exceptional architecture deserves exceptional representation.

innovation.title: Innovation Through Tradition
innovation.desc: Combining time-honored craftsmanship techniques with cutting-edge digital fabrication.

collaboration.title: Collaborative Excellence
collaboration.desc: Ideas flow freely in our open studio environment where every voice contributes to creative solutions.

growth: Apprentice Artisan → Journey Craftsperson → Master Model Maker
